feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Spanish Update by @CertainBot in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1582
  • Update nl.json by @Stephan-P in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1575
  • Update ja.json by @bluefly000 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1569
  • Update de.json by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1568
  • Update README by @Hamster45105 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1585
  • Fix README link by @Hamster45105 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1591
  • Update Chinese translation by @LilligantMatsuri in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1598
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1606:
  • Add more links to the settings page (#1554)
  • Support for more Huawei AppGallery URL schemes (#1570)
  • Fix HTML release asset download (#1578)
  • Fix non-APK GitHub release asset downloads (#1581)
  • Fix asset date UI (#1590)

New Contributors

  • @Stephan-P made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1575
  • @Hamster45105 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1585

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.6...v1.1.7

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enable per-app language, closes #1430 by @GitGitro in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1618
  • Update ru.json by @KoolTechTricks in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1616
  • Update zh.json by @ArcticFoxPro in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1608
  • Bugfix: Get initial data on config import, Bugfix: Include overrideSource in exported config by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1619

New Contributors

  • @GitGitro made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1618
  • @KoolTechTricks made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1616

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.7...v1.1.8

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update fa.json by @mxhdee in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1620
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1631
  • Don't use partial downloads for BG tasks (more reliable)
  • More accurate error reports for Huawei AppGallery fails
  • Various bugfixes
  • Update Flutter (Material UI colour is now slightly less saturated)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.8...v1.1.9

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update vi.json by @teaminh in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1633
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1643
  • Bugfix: Include GitLab token in APK request (#1622)
  • Bugfix: Don't trim trailing slashes when parsing links (#1625)
  • Improve contrast of placeholder icon in dark mode (#1637)
  • Improve app loading times
  • Revert a previous change to background downloads
  • Add a "clear logs" button

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.9...v1.1.10

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reworked french translation by @AntoninDelFabbro in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1670
  • Add da.json by @Grooty12 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1657
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1672:
  • Add release date extraction for track-only GitLab and Codeberg apps (#1664)
  • Add a scrollbar to the apps page

New Contributors

  • @AntoninDelFabbro made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1670
  • @Grooty12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1657

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.10...v1.1.11
